Desc.entry: Private residential care home for older people (memory impaired, respite and long-term care). 34 beds all ensuite. Also provides domicillary care. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

DisabledAccess.entry: Level access lift to all floors

ContactName.entry: Kathryn Moore, Manager/Mr Simon Mills, Proprietor

category.entry: CARE HOMES FOR OLDER PEOPLE (RESIDENTIAL HOMES)
